{{Infobox egg |name = Dragon Egg |image = [[File:Bag_Dragon_Egg_Sprite.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Dragon Egg''. |price = 1000 {{Questpoints}} |location = [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Ever Grande City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Sinnoh_Cities_.26_Towns|Celestic Town]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Icirrus City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kalos_Cities_.26_Towns|Couriway Town]] }} ===Description=== A '''Dragon Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Dragon-type Pokémon. ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! --- || [[File:Bagon_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bagon.png|50px]] Bagon || [[File:Gible_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Gible.png|50px]] Gible || [[File:Deino_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Deino.png|50px]] Deino || [[File:Goomy_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Goomy.png|50px]] Goomy |- | [[File:Dragonair_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonair.png|50px]] Dragonair ||
